jsky.util
Class JavaUtil

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jsky.util.JavaUtil
public class JavaUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains some compatibility and utility methods for use under jdk1.2 and jdk1.3. Since there is no #ifdef in Java, these methods take care of checking which Java version is being used before using a feature that only works in one version.

Field Summary
static boolean IS_JDK12
          Set to true if using jdk1.2.x (otherwise, assume jdk1.3 or greater)
 
Constructor Summary
JavaUtil()
           
 
Method Summary
static void addShutdownHook(java.lang.Thread t)
          In jdk1.3, calls Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(t), otherwise does nothing.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
